content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command on a Wikipedia page, but it returned too much output. I then used the "get_text_summary" command to obtain a summary of the page's text on Artificial Intelligence. The summary includes information on AI's history, subfields, applications, tools, risks, and ethical considerations. It also discusses machine learning, natural language processing, neural networks, and the need for regulation and ethical considerations in AI development.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "How to explore and learn new things"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.betterup.com/blog/learn-something-new", "https://zapier.com/blog/learning-new-skills/", "https://www.wikihow.com/Learn-New-Things", "https://vedapragna.medium.com/8-reasons-why-i-love-to-learn-new-things-203428d4e2fe", "https://www.indeed.com/career-advice/career-development/learn-new-skills", "https://www.gse.harvard.edu/news/uk/21/12/5-ways-learn-new-things-new-year", "https://www.developgoodhabits.com/new-skills-to-learn/", "https://www.verywellmind.com/how-to-become-a-more-effective-learner-2795162"]', type='action_result')]
"""
